Employee2.name: Employee2
Employee2.description: Represents an employee within a company or an organization.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO currency code for the post-authorization request.

EmployeeNumber.description: The employee's unique ID for their organization.

EmployeeType.description: The employee's full-time or part-time status.

EmploymentType.description: The employee's full-time or part-time status.

InternalOrganizationUnitId.description: The internal organization unit associated with the employee.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that the user only accessed the record or a related list view (LastReferencedDate), but not viewed the record itself.

Name.description: The name of the employee record.

StatusEndDate.description: The planned end date for the employee’s status.

StatusStartDate.description: The start date of the employee’s current status.
